sent2: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
The weekend was either sunny or windy.
Two of the shirts were striped.
The students were sometimes but not always tired.
All of the players were skillful.
He thought the cookie was excellent.
sent1: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
The weekend was sunny or windy.
Three of the shirts were striped.
Some but not all of the players were skillful.
She liked but didn't love the movie.
He thought the cookie was good.
